description:
This time they go to Kazusa, where for some reason the celestial maiden squad is very popular. Celestial Maiden Sumerage plans to use this popularity to make them successful pop stars.  Her plan succeeds, and a huge Celestial Maiden Squad boom occurs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Star Is Born! We`re the Celestial Maiden Squad!
歌姫爆誕! 天女隊でびゅ~!
